app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Slideshow Photo Video Maker
app_description: Turn your memories into movies with music. The app helps you to create beautiful SlideShow from your photos. It s completely FREE. Simple steps: Pick your photos Organize them in the right order Long tap a photo and drag to reorder it Select a transition to animate between photos Choose your favorite music from our gallery or your own songs. Select the slideshow s length to change the duration per photo. Share it on Facebook Instagram Snapchat YouTube or save it to your camera roll. So let s make your memories even more amazing
